sentences.cn: 硬缠着某人(而不肯离开 )

sentences.en: He doesn't try to foist his beliefs on everyone.
sentences.cn: 他不会勉强每个人接受他的信念.

sentences.en: He tried to foist some inferior goods ( off ) on me.
sentences.cn: 他企图把一些劣质货强售给我.

sentences.en: He's religious but he doesn't try to foist his beliefs on everyone.
sentences.cn: 他是教徒,但他不想把自己的信仰强加于人.

sentences.en: Translators should not foist their own opinions into the original book.
sentences.cn: 译者不应把自己的意见偷偷地插入原著中.

sentences.en: You can't foist your ideas on me.
sentences.cn: 你不能把你的观点强加于我.

words.tran_cn: 偷偷插入；混入；蒙骗；硬卖给；采用欺骗手段出售；把…强加于
